description.raw:
Make sure you have a joystick connected. If using docker, be sure to run with `--device=/dev/input/js0`.

On one terminal:

~~~
cd examples/standalone/joystick
mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
make
./joystick ../joystick.sdf
~~~

On another terminal:

~~~
cd examples/standalone/joy_to_twist
mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
make
./joy_to_twist ../joy_to_twist.sdf
~~~

On a 3rd terminal:

~~~
cd ign-gazebo
ign-gazebo -v 4 -f examples/worlds/diff_drive.sdf
~~~

Unpause and command away!

---

## TODO (MVP)

* ~~Finish passing SDF args for `joy_to_twist`~~
* ~~Fix style~~

Done!

## TODO (future)

* "launch" standalone programs from `ign-gazebo`?
* Integration tests
